comment: belgian wit sour half batch lactobacillus for three days before boiling out, adding 1 oz. boil sorachi ace and .5 at 0 end.  secondary additions to beer include 3 oz toasted apple wood and 66 oz of 100% sour cherry juice.  1.5 tsp of coriander and 1 tsp sea salt and 2 tsp lemon peel added in boil.
